alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Randolph, northeastern Jackson and central Lawrence Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Rock, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... College City... Portia... Alicia... Minturn... Sedgwick... Powhatan... Strangers Home... Shannon... Dicus... Elnora... Lauratown... Clover Bend... Calvin... Coffman... Sharum... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
